name: Italian trans-dev
tagline: Machine-corrected Italian translations of Greek and Latin works.
body:
#Welcome to italian_trans-dev!

##About
This repository contains machine-corrected Italian translations of public-domain Greek and Latin works.

These XML files were produced by data entry company [Digital Divide Data](http://www.digitaldividedata.com), who OCR'd, corrected and encoded the texts in accordance with the latest [EpiDoc](http://sourceforge.net/p/epidoc/wiki/Home/) standards. While adequate, more can and should be done to improve the XML (the -dev(elopment) suffix indicates the repository is open to improvement).

##Contents

###Latin

###Ancient Greek
* Senofonte. _[Degli Amori di Abrocome ed Anzia](https://github.com/OpenGreekAndLatin/italian_trans-dev/blob/master/xenophon_1863.xml)_, Tradotto da Anton Maria Salvini (1836) Milano: G. Daelli.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
